mapper.select:
select s.id,s.modified,s.display,s.context,u.username,t.name,s.star from shopcontext s LEFT JOIN userinformation u on s.uid=u.id LEFT JOIN shopinformation t ON s.sid=t.id
limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.update:
update shopcontext t
modified = #{modified},
sid = #{sid},
context = #{context},
display = #{display},
uid = #{uid},
where t.id = #{id}
